Text:
Thank you for all your wonderful uploads.

We shall be grateful if you could upload Damul by Prakash Jha. Its very rare to find.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0088986/

Thank you!
Please tell me the duration of this copy. The original movie was around 3hr 20 minutes long, but the version released on dvd/vcd was under 3 hrs.
